snippet: Raf Simons, a minimalist designer, now must work within the confines of classically feminine Dior. Among fashion editors, the move was described as a bold choice.
abstract: Fashion designer Raf Simons will show his first collection for the house of Dior during July couture season; many believe that Simons, given his minimalist approach to design, will undoubtedly create something exciting for Dior, but some retailers wonder it hiring Simons was too bold a move for the fabled and classically feminine house of couture.
lead_paragraph: Raf Simons, a minimalist designer, now must work within the confines of classically feminine Dior. Among fashion editors, the move was described as a bold choice.

headline.seo: Fashion Insiders Wonder Whether Simons Can Adapt at Dior
headline.main: Do These Two Looks Mix Well?
headline.print_headline: Do These Two Looks Mix Well?
